newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.headline: Newsletter Form
newsletter.dataProtection: I accept the privacy policy and terms of service
newsletter.successSubscribed: You have just subscribed to our newsletter. To finalise your registration, look for our confirmation email in your email box and click on the link it contains.
newsletter.subscriptionCheckbox: Yes, I would like to subscribe to the free Demostore newsletter. (I may unsubscribe at any time.)
newsletter.subscriptionInfo: Please check your email to confirm your newsletter subscription.
newsletter.confirmError: Failed to confirm newsletter subscription. Please try again or contact support.
